body_html:
The PR has been rebased to resolve the merge conflict. The Windows issue may still exist.

I finally managed to find a Windows VM image from Microsoft:
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines

I will spend some time to see if I could fix the Windows issue.

body:
The PR has been rebased to resolve the merge conflict. The Windows issue may still exist.

I finally managed to find a Windows VM image from Microsoft:
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines

I will spend some time to see if I could fix the Windows issue.
